Brazil: Fort Coligny on Villegagnon Island in Rio de Janeiro is attacked and destroyed during the Portuguese campaign against France Antarctique.
Estonia: Duke Magnus of Holstein takes power in the Bishopric of Ösel-Wiek.
Russian troops defeat the Livonian Order in the Battle of Härgmäe.
Russian troops capture Central Estonia from the Livonian Order.
Ivan the Terrible decimated the Livonian Order in the Battle of Ergeme.
France: Francis II died. With no heir, he was succeeded by his brother Charles IX.
Japan: Battle of Okehazama: Oda Nobunaga emerged victorious.
Malta: The Knights of Malta escalate their corsairing activities in the western Mediterranean. (to 1565)
Russia: Battle of Ergeme: Ivan's army crushed the forces of the Livonian Order.
